simplifiedChinese.title: The King's Final Days
simplifiedChinese.Question1: In this story is there an example that you should imitate? What is it?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What steps can you take today to do this?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: In this story is there an example that you should avoid? What is it?
